thread.title: Kumail Nanjiani Wants to ‘Un-Masturbate’ to Jenna Jameson After She Compares Muslims to KKK
thread.title_full: Kumail Nanjiani Wants to ‘Un-Masturbate’ to Jenna Jameson After She Compares Muslims to KKK

author: Reid Nakamura
title: Kumail Nanjiani Wants to ‘Un-Masturbate’ to Jenna Jameson After She Compares Muslims to KKK
text:
Search Kumail Nanjiani Wants to ‘Un-Masturbate’ to Jenna Jameson After She Compares Muslims to KKK 
“Is it possible to go back in time?” the “Silicon Valley” actor asks of ex-porn star Reid Nakamura   3:54 PM HBO 
“Silicon Valley” star Kumail Nanjiani wants to “un-masturbate” to Jenna Jameson after the ex-porn star’s string or recent anti-Muslim tweets. 
“Is it possible to go back in time & un-masturbate to somebody?” the actor wryly joked on Twitter on Wednesday. 
Nanjiani wrote the tweet in response to Jameson’s recent tweets which compared Muslims to members of the Ku Klux Klan. “Do the klu klux klan follow a religion that orders the death of apostates? When was the last time we saw a klan member blow up infidels?,” Jameson wrote in a since-deleted tweet. Also Read: Jenna Jameson Compares Muslims to KKK, Defends Milo Yiannopoulos in Twitter Tirade 
She doubled down on the comments when Twitter users pointed out that the hate group has committed lynchings in the past. 
“Yes, and thank god they’ve been all but eradicated and forced into obscurity… no thanks to the democrats who created them,” she wrote. Also Read: Ex-Porn Star Jenna Jameson to Move to Israel 
One of the first responses to Nanjiani’s tweet was from his wife Emily V. Gordon, with whom he teamed to co-write the 2017 Sundance breakout “The Big Sick.” 
“Go back to sleep,” Gordon wrote . “Also yes it’s possible. Also welcome to being a woman- our sex heroes always fall.” @kumailn go back to sleep. Also yes it’s possible. Also welcome to being a woman- our sex heroes always fall. 
– Emily V Gordon (@emilyvgordon) February 22, 2017 'Silicon Valley' Exclusive Portraits From Wrap Emmy Magazine Shoot (Photos) Thomas Middleditch, Martin Starr, Kumail Nanjiani, T.J. Miller, Zach Woods Corina Marie Howell/TheWrap
